title: AWS re:Invent 2025-How to build an AI Engine to generate near real time insights for videos at scale
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 如何构建AI引擎以大规模生成视频的近实时洞察
abstract: Japanese startup, SDio, has been transforming streaming data into actionable intelligence through cutting-edge Deep Search & Analytics empowering enterprises with precise video and audio intelligence to redefine business agility.  Find out how they built large scale video understanding engine to unlock intelligence for enterprises.
abstract_cn: 日本初创公司SDio一直致力于通过尖端的深度搜索与分析技术将流数据转化为可操作的智能洞察，为企业提供精准的视频和音频智能，重新定义业务敏捷性。了解他们如何构建大规模视频理解引擎，为企业释放智能价值。
